name: Digi School
description: A modern and efficient School Management System built with Angular 16, featuring a responsive design and comprehensive functionality for managing school operations.

name: Bid TUN
description: A modern auction platform built with React and Laravel, enabling users to create, track, and bid on products in real-time.

name: Medical Appointment Platform
description: FindDoctor is a modern web application built with React and Vite that connects patients with healthcare providers. This platform facilitates easy appointment scheduling, doctor search, and medical service management.

description: QuizMaster Pro is a modern, multilingual quiz application built with Flutter and powered by Firebase. It offers an engaging quiz experience enhanced with real-time feedback, sound effects, score tracking, and push notifications â€” all wrapped in a beautiful and responsive interface.

name: System Monitoring Application
description: A robust and scalable system monitoring application built with FastAPI, designed to track and analyze application performance metrics in real-time.
